0: Community_3 offers a lower rent price and great amenities for families. It is a great place to live with easy access to public transportation, and there are many parks, playgrounds, shops and restaurants in the area. The environment is safe and secure, and it is close to hospitals and schools.
2: Community_3 offers good greenery, parking lot, and sports&fitness equipment with a rent of 40 dollars per square meter, and it has metro, supermarkets, mall, hospital, park, school, restaurant and bank.
3: Ronghui is a great community with an affordable rent of 1400.0, 81 minutes proximity to my workplace, great amenities including a parking lot, and sports & fitness equipment. The neighborhood is friendly, with good schools, playgrounds, and a balcony. Natural lighting is also plentiful. In comparison to Community_2, it has a lower rent even though it is child-friendly, and Community_1 lacks some important amenities.

1: Longxing is located in the Haidian district and offers an affordable rental rate of 2500 RMB. The community provides excellent scenic views and is surrounded by useful amenities. The infrastructure is well-developed and offers many convenient options. There is also a good amount of green space and nearby hospitals.

4: Jinkejiayuan (Community_2) has a price reduction measure, making it more suitable for families with a limited budget. It also offers great amenities for families, such as public transportation, schools, playgrounds, shops, restaurants, and hospitals.
